import React, {Component} from 'react'; class Header extends Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.state={ userId:'', password:'', firstName:'', lastName:'', address1:'', address2:'', city:'', zip:'', phone:'', cell:'', email:'' } } render(){ //console.log(this.props.loggedInUser); return (this.props.loggedInUser===""?(
Schools.com
Register User


): (
Schools.com {this.props.startedQuiz!==null? ( ):null}
Logout


)) } } export default Header;
